properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 9:36AM EST until February 15 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 25 knots from the
southwest with gusts up to 33 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 1 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 2
feet.

* WHERE...Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
and Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to
Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 2 PM EST Saturday
with the largest waves expected around 1 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
